name: Northpole - 1
description:
Every boxing day after dropping off the worlds children their presents, Santa Claus, operating under callsign 'Northpole-1' hones his sleigh skills at the Delamere Air Weapons Range. Help Santa drop presents on all the targets, and dont be afraid to look for some help from above.

First NT resident to hit all 7 targets and screenshot it gets a steam key for the Air Combat game 'Project Wingman'

G - Giddy up (If you have accelerated and you arent moving, press G to give Rudoplh and little Giddy up

X - Drop presents

W- Pitch Down

S- Pitch Up

A - Roll Left

D- Roll Right

Q- Yaw Left

E - Yaw Right

Left Shift - Accelerate

Left Control - Decelerate

C - Change Camera

Sources :

FREE - Christmas Bells WAV - Freesound - Zoe Fitzgerald

FREE - Ho Ho Ho - Freesound - Cloud10

FREE - Air Traffic Control Tower - 3D Warehouse - Paul K

FREE - Runway =- 3D warehouse - Andrea Cortesi

Pixelated Camera Effect - itch.io - andii

PAID - Easy Minimap - Free Alternative : Drag and Drop Minimap

FREE - Navy Pack - Unity Asset Store

PAID - Simple Airplane Controller - I wanted to use the free Unity Standard Asset Flight Controller, But it was having bugs as soon as I put it in the project, nobody has time for that in a 3 week game jam so I used this one I had.

PAID - Malbers Animations - Horse Animset Pro - Used this to animate Santa sitting in his sleigh

PAID - Merry Christmas Low Poly Christmas Models
